sentences.en: I thought I was being generous. Turns out that makes me, at best, an average tipper.
sentences.cn: 我认为自己已经够大方了. 最后却发觉我给的小费最多也就算个平均水平.

sentences.en: It realizes automatic design of lifting tipper mechanism and become a design pattern of it.
sentences.cn: 从而实现了自卸车举升机构设计的模式化、自动化、工具化.

sentences.en: Louis , found the generosity of tipper may be limited by their bill.
sentences.cn: 迈尔森发现,给小费者人是否慷慨可能会受到帐单金额的影响.

sentences.en: Main Products: CNHTC tractor cargo truck, tipper trucks , special truck for army , special truck for projects.
sentences.cn: 主要经营: 中国重汽牵引车、载货车 、 自卸车 、 特种车、专用车.

sentences.en: My father is such a tight tipper, it embarrasses me.
sentences.cn: 我爸爸给小费很吝啬, 令我很尴尬.

sentences.en: The waiters liked him for being a big tipper.
sentences.cn: 他给小费出手慷慨,侍者都喜欢他.

sentences.en: You become aggressive if a colleague tries to steal your tipper mouse.
sentences.cn: 有时同事偷拿你的修正带会让你口气很冲.

words.tran_cn: 焊接在尖头上的，镶齿的
使倾斜（tip的过去分词）；轻拍
给小费；倾斜；翻倒；装顶端

trans.tran_cn: 自（动倾）卸车，倾卸车的搬运夫，挑选家禽的工人，用模具压制毡帽的工人
trans.tran_en: a person who gives or leaves a tip
